champ.champInfo:
The general management of the organization and conduct of competitions is carried out by the Department of National Patriotic Education, Youth and Sports of Zhytomyr Oblast. The direct holding of the competition is entrusted to the NGO "Kyokushinkai Karate Federation of Zhytomyr Region"

Organizing committee and judges:

  • The chief judge of the competition is Volodymyr Gusev (Zviagel)
  • Secretary of the competition — Artem Vlasenko, (Zvyagel)
  • Technical support — Igor Tatarchenko, (Lviv)

Venue of the competition: Lyceum No. 11 of the Zvyagel city council, str. Commonwealth, 3/8

The competition will be held in Zviagel on March 10, 2024.

Competition program

March 10 (Sunday):

  • 07:00-08:00 Arrival of teams at the venue of the competition, registration
  • 08:00-08:30 approval of competition protocols
  • 08:30-09:00 meeting of competition judges
  • 09:00-09:30 ceremonial opening of the competition
  • 09:30-13:00 qualifying matches
  • 13:00-13:30 lunch
  • 13:30-17:00 semi-final and final matches
  • 17:00-18:00 awarding of winners and prize-winners of the competition, closing of the competition
  • 18:00-18:30 departure of the teams

Competition rules.

  • Competitions are held separately for male and female participants

Series B - participants with qualification 0 - 9 kyu.
Series A - participants with qualifications from 8 kyu.

Categories of participants:

Younger boys/girls. Series A and Series B separately.
Year of birth Sex Weight categories
2010-2011 Young men -35 -40 -45 -50 -55 -60 -65 +65
2010-2011 Girls -35 -40 -45 -50 -55 -60 -65 +65
2012-2013 Young men -30 -35 -40 -45 -50 -55 +55
2012-2013 Girls -30 -35 -40 -45 -50 -55 +55
2014-2015 Young men -25 -30 -35 -40 -45 +45
2014-2015 Girls -25 -30 -35 -40 -45 +45
2016-2017 Young men -20 -25 -30 -35 -40 +40
2016-2017 Girls -20 -25 -30 -35 -40 +40
Scheme of matches: 1 min., 1 min.

Categories of young men, juniors and adults without division by qualification degree
Boys/girls:
Year of birth Gender Weight categories
2008-2009 Young men -50 -55 -60 -65 -70 -75 +75
2008-2009 Girls -45 -50 -55 -60 +60
Scheme of matches: 1.5 min., 1.5 min., 1.5 min.


Juniors:
Year of birth Gender Weight categories
2006-2007 Juniors -60 -65 -70 -75 -80 +80
2006-2007 Junior girls -50 -55 -60 +60

Men/Women:
Year of birth Gender Weight categories
1990-2005 Men -65 -75 -85 +85
1990-2005 women -55 -60 -65 +65
Match schedule: 2.0 min., 2.0 min., 2.0 min.

Competition conditions

  • Competitions are held in accordance with the "Kyokushinkai Karate Competition Rules" in force in Ukraine
  • Team scoring is common for male and female participants and is defined in the sections "kumite" and "show performances"
  • To determine the places of teams based on individual and team championships, the results of only those participants who are part of the qualifying teams will be taken into account
  • The standings of the teams are finally determined by the mandate committee
  • Team points are calculated according to the Rules of Kyokushinkai karate competitions in force in Ukraine
  • IMPORTANT !!! Competitions will be held in compliance with the security conditions provided for by the law of Ukraine on martial law. In the event of the announcement of an air alert in the region, the competition will be stopped, and all participants will go to the shelter, which is located in the basement of the Lyceum

Financing

Expenses for the organization of the competition are carried out at the expense of the Zhytomyr Regional Federation of Kyokushinkai Karate, interested institutions, organizations and sponsors.Travel expenses of participants, team representatives, coaches, judges (travel in both directions, location, food, per diem on the road, salary maintenance) - at the expense of the organizations that travel

Awards

  • Athletes who took 1st place are awarded with diplomas, medals of the respective degrees and cups
  • Athletes who took 2nd-3rd place are awarded diplomas and medals of the respective degrees

Registration

Registration for participation in the competition takes place through a personal account until March 4, 2024.

Application letter for participation according to the form established by the NFKKU, approved by the medical and physical culture dispensary and the head of sports. Organizations are submitted to the mandate commission before the start of the competition. Teams that have confirmed their participation within the set deadline are admitted to the competition
